resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/77133</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77133</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0ae9-941c-4252-26cf-c04b4b3a323f#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Franciaország nagy krónikája.</string>
            <string language="en">The Great Chronicle of France</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die große Chronik von Frankreich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La grande chronique de la France</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O chronicle grande de France</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il chronicle grande della Francia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο μεγάλος εξιστορεί κατά γράμμα της Γαλλίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El gran chronicle de Francia</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">a franciáknak a trójaiaktól való mondabeli származását ábrázoló négy kép.</string>
            <string language="en">The four picture presenting the mythical Trojan origin of the French</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">krónika,  Trója,  Iliász,  trójai háború,  Heléna,  Francion,  Hektor,  Sicambria,  V. Károly francia király,  </string>
            <string language="en">Chronicle, Troy, Ilyada, Trojan war, Helena, Francion, Hector, Sicambria, Charles V. the French King</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung vier, die den mythischen Trojan 
Ursprung der Franzosen darstellt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'image quatre présentant l'origine mythique de 
Trojan du Français</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O retrato quatro que apresenta a origem mythical 
de Trojan do francês</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'immagine quattro che presenta l'origine 
mythical del Trojan del francese</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εικόνα τέσσερα που παρουσιάζει τη μυθική τρωική 
προέλευση των Γάλλων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cuadro cuatro que presenta el origen mítico 
de Trojan del francés</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chronik, Troy, Ilyada, Trojan Krieg, Helena, Francion, 
Tyrann, Sicambria, Charles V. der französische König</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chronique, Troy, Ilyada, guerre de Trojan, Helena,
Francion, fanfaron, Sicambria, Charles V. le roi français</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chronicle, Troy, Ilyada, guerra de Trojan, Helena, 
Francion, hector, Sicambria, Charles V. o rei francês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chronicle, Troy, Ilyada, guerra di Trojan, Helena, 
Francion, tormentatore, Sicambria, Charles V. il re francese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξιστορήστε κατά γράμμα, τρόυ, Ilyada, τρωικός πόλεμος,
Helena, Francion, Hector, Sicambria, Charles V. ο 
γαλλικός βασιλιάς</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Chronicle, Troy, Ilyada, guerra de Trojan, Helena, 
Francion, matón, Sicambria, Charles V. el rey francés</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Veszprémi Egyetem
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>77133</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=40cf0ae9-941c-4252-26cf-c04b4b3a323f&v=1&b=3</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
"
